Forms Contact Us Apply Online Request Info Visit Campus DePaul University>Admission & Aid>Financial Aid>Types of Aid Types of Aid Financial aid comes from many different sources: federal and state government, private associations and organizations, your employer and DePaul itself. Financial aid is grouped into two main categories: Gift aidis financial assistance that you do not have to repay. It's often awarded based on financial need or academic merit. It includes: Scholarships Grants Military & Veteran Benefits Assistantships Study Abroad Self-helpis financial assistance that must be repaid, or earned through an on-campus job. It includes: Federal Loans Private Loans Work-Study Financial aid offers usually consist of a combination of gift aid and self-help aid. Need help understanding your options?Contact the Office of Financial Aidto speak with a counselor.
